routines: regular visits to ramen and noodle houses

Additionally, his engagement with electronics suggests an interest in technology and possibly gaming. He also visits bookstores, indicative of a love for reading and culture. User 1977 appears to appreciate stability and exhibits open-mindedness in exploring various dining options and entertainment.
